desc: Carefully blended high quality, ayurvedic herbs and spices like Malabar Tamarind (Garcinia Cambogia), Lemongrass, Cinnamon, Ginger and Makandi (Coleus), superfoods like Triphala, Licorice, Cinnamon, Ajwain, Bay Leaf, and 20 other herbs like Cardamom, Black Pepper, Ginger, Clove, Fennel, Aswan, Pipli, Star Anise etc.

layout.text: India's Wellness Secrets in your cup of Tea
